summary:
*Video Coming In A Couple Of Days*
This is a house which has everything you need to Fly Through the game. This mod contains everything you could want or need to get the best experience out of this great game and this great mod. This mod contains all work benches including a bed, a new spell, an awesome follower, tons of crafting materials and mu
descriptionHtml:
*Video Coming In A Couple Of Days*
Also Available in Steam Workshop

This Mod Includes:
- A Killer Spell Called - The FlyThrough Curse
- Skill Tomes
- A Player House with all Work Benches including a Bed.
- 3 sets of fully enchanted and upgraded armour. All sets have same armour rating however the Daedric armour levels the Light Armour Skill, the Dragon Scale Armour levels the Heavy Armour Skill and the Archmage and Dragon Priest clothes level both and Magic
- A door to Riften to save time getting from one side of the map to the other, especially handy for people starting Dawnguard.
- Tons & Tons of crafting materials. 
- A Spirit Dog Follower (Now Fully Functioning)
- A Mini Kinda Quest/Objective

Latest Update:
- Made Some Minor Adjustments To Armours
- Improved Lighting
- Fixed Dog Follower 
- Added More Great Looking Clutter
- Added Little Quest/Objective
- Added Callapsed Mine Area On The Side Of The House
- Improve Work Station (Bedroll Is Now A Bed With A Bedside Table With Some Stuff Both In And On It)
- Added Navmesh So That Followers Include The Spirit Dog Can Now Move Around Freely And Seem More Lifelike
- Added A Weapon Thats Only In This Mod
- Rearranged Rooms A Little To Increase Nice Flow
- Made Minor Adjustments To The Garden And Other Miscellaneous Things Like That

Update 3: 
- Renamed armour
- Made minor changes in general
- Fixed the fast traveling bug
- Added a alchemy garden at the front of the house for both look and crafting

Update 2:
- Added and fixed more lighting
- Added a garden out the front for alchemy
- Added crafting materials.

Update 1:
- Put in Lighting
- Added Miscellaneous Items
- Added Spirit Dog Follower
- Re-furnished the house
- Updated The Location
- Can Now Fast Travel
- Better Proportioned the House
author: Kaden Mathis and Liam Dowie
